properties.name: app.log.timestampPattern
properties.description: The log date has to be changed to YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ, please provide basic.

properties.name: app.log.fields
properties.description: Names of named groups, which should be sent to azure.

properties.name: app.azure.workspaceId
properties.description: Log Analytics Workspace ID, can be found in the Azure "Overview" tab.

properties.name: app.azure.connectionKey
properties.description: Log Analytics secondary or primary key, can be found in Azure "Agent Management".
